statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE location='Room A' ORDER BY reading_time DESC
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(sensor_value) AS average_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id
SELECT sensor_name, location, MAX(sensor_value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data WHERE location IS NOT NULL GROUP BY sensor_name
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, reading_time, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id=1 ORDER BY reading_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, reading_time, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY reading_time DESC
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY sensor_name ASC, reading_time ASC
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 50 AND sensor_value < 100 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_value, location FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name LIKE 'Temperature%' ORDER BY sensor_id DESC, reading_time ASC
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value, location FROM sensor_data WHERE location = 'Lab A' ORDER BY sensor_value DESC
SELECT * FROM sensors
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_value FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type='temperature'
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_value > 50
SELECT sensor_id, location, timestamp FROM sensors ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_type, sensor_name
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensors WHERE sensor_value > 50 ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT AVG(sensor_value) AS average_value, MIN(sensor_value) AS min_value, MAX(sensor_value) AS max_value FROM sensors GROUP BY sensor_type;
SELECT sensor_name, location, timestamp FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' AND sensor_value BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_name, location, timestamp FROM sensors WHERE location LIKE '%floor%' OR location LIKE '%basement%' ORDER BY location DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, location FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM SensorReadings WHERE reading_value > 50 ORDER BY reading_timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(reading_value) AS average_reading FROM SensorReadings GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING AVG(reading_value) > 30;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(anomaly_score) AS max_score FROM SensorAnalytics GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM Sensors
SELECT sensor_type, location FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature'
SELECT sensor_type, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM Sensors GROUP BY sensor_type

SELECT Sensors.sensor_id, Sensors.location, SensorReadings.reading_value, SensorReadings.reading_timestamp FROM Sensors JOIN SensorReadings ON Sensors.sensor_id = SensorReadings.sensor_id WHERE SensorReadings.reading_value > 50
SELECT Sensors.sensor_id, AVG(anomaly_score) AS avg_score FROM Sensors JOIN SensorAnalytics ON Sensors.sensor_id = SensorAnalytics.sensor_id GROUP BY Sensors.sensor_id
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, value FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM SensorLocation WHERE location IN ('Room A', 'Room B');
SELECT sensor_id, manufacturer, model FROM SensorMetadata WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc';
SELECT * FROM SensorAlerts ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_type='Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT s.sensor_id, s.value, l.location FROM SensorData s JOIN SensorLocation l ON s.sensor_id = l.sensor_id WHERE s.value > 50 ORDER BY s.value DESC, l.location;

SELECT s.sensor_id, m.manufacturer, m.model, a.message FROM SensorAlerts a JOIN SensorMetadata m ON a.sensor_id = m.sensor_id JOIN SensorData s ON a.sensor_id = s.sensor_id WHERE a.timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY a.timestamp ASC;
SELECT AVG(value), COUNT(*) FROM SensorData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND sensor_type='Temperature';

SELECT s.sensor_id, s.timestamp, l.location, m.manufacturer FROM SensorData s JOIN SensorLocation l ON s.sensor_id = l.sensor_id JOIN SensorMetadata m ON s.sensor_id = m.sensor_id WHERE m.manufacturer='Company X' ORDER BY s.timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC, reading_timestamp ASC
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensors WHERE status='active' LIMIT 5
SELECT sensor_id, reading_value FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type='temperature'
SELECT * FROM sensor_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
SELECT model_name, trained_on FROM ai_models ORDER BY trained_on DESC
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE location='Room A' ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_type, reading_value FROM sensors WHERE status='ACTIVE' AND reading_value > 50 ORDER BY reading_value ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, location, status, reading_timestamp FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type='Temperature' AND status='ERROR' ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT log_id, sensor_id, message, log_timestamp FROM sensor_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT sensor_id, analysis_type, result_value, result_timestamp FROM analysis_results WHERE result_value < 0.5 ORDER BY result_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
